edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.hadoopinterface.infrastructure
Class HadoopRecord

java.lang.Object
  edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.thrift.curator.Record
      edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.hadoopinterface.infrastructure.HadoopRecord
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Comparable<edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.thrift.curator.Record>, Writable, WritableComparable<edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.thrift.curator.Record>, org.apache.thrift.TBase<edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.thrift.curator.Record,edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.thrift.curator.Record._Fields>
public class HadoopRecord
extends edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.thrift.curator.Record
implements WritableComparable<edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.thrift.curator.Record>

A version of the Curator's document record, for use on the Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS), which does not rely on database calls. Implements WritableComparable so that it can be used as a key or value in a MapReduce job.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

HadoopRecord

public HadoopRecord()
Zero-argument constructor for use by the Hadoop backend. It calls this constructor, then reads the fields in using the Writable interface. (Within the readFields() method, we call the initializeAllVars() method so that you wind up with a normal, filled object.)

HadoopRecord

public HadoopRecord(String documentHash,
                    FileSystem fs,
                    Configuration config)
Constructs a record object and fills it with all annotations for this document which already exist on the Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS).

Parameters:
documentHash - The hash for the document (i.e. hash.txt) whose annotations this record stores
fs - A filesystem object with which this Record can access the Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS)
config - Hadoop Configuration for this job, containing HDFS file path
Method Detail

getDocumentPath

public Path getDocumentPath()
Returns:
The directory in HDFS containing all this document's text files (the original.txt along with the annotations). This will simply be [job input directory]/[this document's hash]/.

getDocumentHash

public String getDocumentHash()
Returns:
String: The hash identifying the document that this record describes

setMessageLogger

public void setMessageLogger(MessageLogger logger)
Primarily for testing purposes. Specify the message logger to use for logging messages.

Parameters:
logger - The message logger to which we should output.

addAnnotation

public void addAnnotation(AnnotationMode type,
                          org.apache.thrift.TBase annotation)
Adds an annotation to the record. If that annotation type already exists in the record, it will be silently overwritten.

Parameters:
type - The type of annotation being added
annotation - The Thrift data structure representing the annotation

meetsDependencyReqs

public boolean meetsDependencyReqs(AnnotationMode annotationToPerform)
Checks that this record provides all annotations required by a particular annotation tool.

Parameters:
annotationToPerform - The type of annotation to be performed on the record.
Returns:
True if this record contains all annotations on which the annotation to be performed depends, false otherwise.
